statements: SELECT * FROM customer_preferences
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS purchase_count FROM customer_preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING purchase_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_preferences WHERE LENGTH(purchase_history) > 100 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, email, age FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers WHERE city='Los Angeles' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_level FROM preferences WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY name DESC, age ASC;
SELECT name, email, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND location='New York';
SELECT customer_id, sum(price) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id=p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, c.name AS customer_name, c.location FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id=c.customer_id WHERE p.price > 50 AND c.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, c.location, pr.category, pr.preference_level FROM customers c LEFT JOIN preferences pr ON c.customer_id=pr.customer_id WHERE pr.preference_level > 3 ORDER BY c.name ASC, pr.category DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'New Customers' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY category, product_name;

SELECT purchase_id, customer_name, product_name, purchase_date, total_price FROM Purchases JOIN Customers ON Purchases.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM Campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%social%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, preference_score FROM preferences INNER JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT campaign_name, product_name FROM campaigns INNER JOIN products ON campaigns.target_product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing')
SELECT customer_name, SUM(p.purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name
SELECT c.customer_name, pr.product_name, pf.preference_score FROM customers c JOIN preferences pf ON c.customer_id = pf.customer_id JOIN products pr ON pf.product_id = pr.product_id
